overview: Joined by a quartet of space-traveling penguins, siblings Michelle and Jason embark on a series of intergalactic adventures in which the fearless 7-year-old twins learn important lessons on morality and values along the way. Highlights include a stop on a small planet populated by feuding sheep, a mission to settle a dispute between a group of garden gnomes and pink flamingos and a visit to the over-indulgent world known as Planet Gutt.
title: 3-2-1 Penguins: Save the Planets
